website_summaries.verdict: It's not perfect, but if you're brave enough to manage your own taxes, then TurboTax 2007 is Intuit's best tax application yet.
pros: TurboTax 2007 introduces an Audit Risk Meter
integration with It'sDeductible to manage charitable contributions
cons: transferring data from a prior return didn't work in one case
the Home & Business edition didn't make it clear we could enter personal income first
live tech support could be more extensive

customer_reviews.title: Don't like audits this is for you
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product for over 20 years and it's never let me down that old path to the IRS audit.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Only suitable for simpler returns.
customer_reviews.text: Ended up not using it. Could not accommodate multi-state return.
customer_reviews.author: Kona Dok

customer_reviews.title: Turbo Tex 2007
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived from the Seller prior to the scheduled delivery date, in the avertised new condition; very pleased with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: A. Diop

customer_reviews.title: Keeps on Getting Better--Accurate and Easy to Use Tax Preparation Product
customer_reviews.text: A comprehensive tax preparation program that guided me clearly and easily through the annual tax chore. You can choose either to enter data directly into fields that fill out the standard schedules or use the "guided tour" that takes you simply and coherently through all elements of your return--income (wages and salary, dividend and interest, capital gains) and deductions (every possible deduction you might be able to claim or credit you may qualify for). Good linkage between federal and state returns, excellent preview of entered data, running totals of refund or payment due and high quality, transparent screens. Runs a diagnostic to determine whether you've entered data consistently and completely. Makes a sometimes painful process manageable and relatively straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: Harris M.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using TurboTax for years (on Mac) and it's VERY easy to use. Doing my taxes just takes an hour or two with no accountant or other help. After you use it a year or two, it grabs most of the data from your previous returns. Also it goes online to get data from your brokerage, your W-2. Very quick. This year I bought Premier because it was advertised as applying to stocks and so forth - but it turned out to be unnecessary. Unless you are running a lot of rental properties, the less expensive Deluxe version would have done everything I needed including stocks, home office, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor.Generosity

customer_reviews.title: Not that much harder than doing taxes by hand ...
customer_reviews.text: If your taxes are very simple, this might work. However, if you have anything out of the ordinary, just forget it, Premiere doesn't handle it either. I know where most of these things go but had to figure out how to trick turbotax into putting things in the right place. I haven't used it but may try Orange Door next time. Cheaper and it couldn't be any worse. TurboTax can't even figure out the "effective tax rate" on the summary page. Oh, and don't bother with feedback or asking for help.
customer_reviews.author: SALAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Better than ever
customer_reviews.text: This year TurboTax has outdone themselves once again. The new version asks all the right questions and makes filing as easy as can be. If it were something besides tax preparation, it could almost be perfect. However,the "FairTax" would help eliminate the need for even the simplest of software programs.
customer_reviews.author: GunKnut43

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back!
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me; it did not have enough explanation for my purposes. We had bought a house last years as well as kept the old house. There was nothing in Turbo Tax which explained how to handle this situation. If I wanted to get help I would have been charged a very high fee for consultation with a tax expert. This program did not work like they claim!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: beware
customer_reviews.text: You will pay for e-filing even if you don't want your information spread across the internet. You will pay an extra $10 for each return you print and file after the first. So, if you file for your family members, you will pay extra when you go to print the additional returns after the first one. When you save a copy of your return for your personal use, a banner that says "DO NOT FILE" will be printed across your return to a point where some of the data is unreadable. If you like all this, then order this product. If you don't like this, order TaxCut.
customer_reviews.author: G. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great download experience
customer_reviews.text: I have used used Turbotax to do my taxes for 10 years now, so there are few surprises. The big innovation this year is the ability to download directly from Amazon! I followed the directions in the Amazon Software Download store and downloaded the Downloader first. I then clicked the "Download" button for this title. Less than a minute later I had Turbotax downloaded to my computer, and about 2 minutes later it was installed and running and I was importing my W-2. What a great experience!
customer_reviews.author: David Glick

customer_reviews.title: they slipped this year
customer_reviews.text: Always depended on turbotax but this year they slipped. Took several times to get thru to them for updateing... must have been alot of folks trying at the same time. Several steps were confusing. Usually they explain all very well but this time I was stuck on what to do next. After several days I got it to work. I've used turbo for years but next time I'll check out other software.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Turbo Tax Premier
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy the deluxe version of Turbo tax but this year, I decided to buy the premier version because I had more investment sells. I didn't find the premier version much better than the deluxe version so to me, it was a waste of the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: Best tax software
customer_reviews.text: TT is my GO-TO tax software every year. This one no exception. Easy, thorough, inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: It's easy and great to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second year using Turbotax. It is easy to use and makes everything very clear. I actually enjoy using it. The feature that shows the impact on one's tax bottom line for each entry is very useful. Also the reviews for errors and for likelihood of audit are useful. It is reassuring to be in the know.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard E. Gottesman

customer_reviews.title: First Time In Ten Years
customer_reviews.text: That I was able to do my own taxes without a CPA and in the economic crunch this product is well worth the money and it really makes you realize where yur money is going and where you should be saving more or less with the way things are going.
customer_reviews.author: JAR

customer_reviews.title: Taxes
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few years, and it is good, but one tax profiler such as this does not fit every user. Some of the explanations need greater detail- which you can go to and retrieve at the IRS site.
customer_reviews.author: Thurm

customer_reviews.title: product was flawed....
customer_reviews.text: opened up turbotax and began a return.... entered lots of information, product quit for no reason, just disappeared, no explanation, no error message, nothing.... re-opened, tried to save after every entry, since all data from first return had been lost, and discovered after it myseteriously quit again that it had only saved some of the information entered.... After an hour on chat with Intuit, I was given a free download.... hope that will work properly......
customer_reviews.author: schuyler bishop

customer_reviews.title: TurboTax Premier
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Guided me through easily. My second year using Premier because of all the 1099's with retirement income, interest, dividends, etc. Carries over losses in investments for you on the next years, and future years returns. Would recommend it to anyone!! Does State and Federal.
customer_reviews.author: C. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Makes Doing Taxes a Breeze
customer_reviews.text: This just works, and it "holds your hands" as you go thru the process.I used this to complete our joint return, our children's returns, and all our state tax returns in an afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Musher

customer_reviews.title: Another year, another painless return with TurboTax
customer_reviews.text: I've been a regular user of TurboTax since 2000 and this product has never seemed to fail me. I downloaded the Windows version via the Amazon downloader without hassle and installed it on my virtual WinXP/Parallels partition on an Intel Macbook Pro (Tiger). The WinXP version of TurboTax ran just as fast in Parallels as previous versions did on my PC (which is a pretty fast video editing machine). Thanks again to Intuit for a great product. And no, I don't work for Amazon or Intuit.
customer_reviews.author: Alip-IT

customer_reviews.title: Solid tax preparation software
customer_reviews.text: Turbotax 2007 continues the tradition of providing solid, no hassle tax preparation for those who feel confident to 'go it alone'. I've been using turbotax for six years now, and it allowed me to complete my own (rather complex) federal and state tax returns each year with about 4 hours work. The only downside is that TurboTax can get a little confusing if you work sequentially through each of the topics.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: The program uses a very easy to follow question format. I began using TurboTax last year to handle taxes regarding a rental property and self-employment tax matters. This program saves me a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: W. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A Very Satisfied Product User
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth year preparing my own Tax returns. With this great product I was able to File both Federal & State on the same day with only two hours at my home PC simply answering questions as the Turbo Tax software would prompt me. They even provide FREE assistance should you be audited, and in the software, they re-check your return before you file for errors. it couldn't be any easier!
customer_reviews.author: Warren C. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: TurboTax 2007
customer_reviews.text: TurboTax Premier 2007 is a very good product and performs as advertized. It is easy to use and can access a large portion of your tax information online, provided you are a user of online services. It was a quick step by step process, that is provided you have all of your tax information readily available. You can complete your state and federal tax return in half a day or less depending upon the complexity of yor return using this software. I can highly recommend TurboTax Premier.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Miller

customer_reviews.title: Premier not worth extra costs
customer_reviews.text: I bought the TurboTax Premier edition, because I have a lot of stock sales to enter. Premier was suppose to allow me to import my information from my broker to save me the time to input this data. Unfortunately, I was not able to get this feature to work even though my broker offered this TurboTax feature. Otherwise, TurboTax was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Eustis

customer_reviews.title: TurboTax Premier Federal & State 2007
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to use and provided more than sufficient information and suggestions as to what type deductions were available. In many cases suggested entries were provided that I had not previously considered. Definitely a "must have" product for the tax season.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rau

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I thinks it's the best on the market,but,needs improvement. The 1099B section does not satisfy my requirements. Very confusing & can lead to bottom line inaccuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Scoopero

customer_reviews.title: Best Tax Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried H&R Block and TaxCut products but TurboTax beats them both in its ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Okayfine87

customer_reviews.title: Unusably slow on fast PC
customer_reviews.text: Installed Turbotax Premier on new Dell Latitude 630, Windows XP SP2, 2GB RAM, .NET framework 3.0 On launching the application, the splash screen hangs on the screen for 5 minutes, minimum. If it ever gets past that, pressing "Start Return" causes the application to hang FOREVER. On hold to reach Intuit tech support for 45 minutes. Talked to tech support for one hour. Put on hold by tech support for 10 minutes, transferred to a different agent and had to start over. No resolution. Jettisoning this out the airlock.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kome

customer_reviews.title: twice burned
customer_reviews.text: My accountant died and everyone said I could do my own taxes. Last year, it worked but I couldn't print a copy for my files. This year, the on-line update isn't working and gives me a server error. It is the only thing I can't do on my high speed cable modem, so it must mean their server. They sell and incomplete product and do not support the updates (there is no human support). Next year I'll find a younger accountant.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than an accountant
customer_reviews.text: I've used TurboTax for several years now and find it fairly easy to use. I chose Premier this year due to a lot of stock option and investment activity, and have not been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Branham

customer_reviews.title: Makes doing taxes easy
customer_reviews.text: I had fairly complicated taxes this year and was I was able to do my taxes very easily by following the step by step instructions.
customer_reviews.author: S. Boudreau

customer_reviews.title: TurboTax Premier
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it is a great product and I wished I started using it years ago. On a few issues, there was some vagueness in the explanations and the customer support responses were just as vague. However, the problems were minimal as the greater majority of the explanations were clear and concise.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Premier Product
customer_reviews.text: This product lives up to it's name. It's very user friendly and easy to navigate after you initially get used to the different screens. I have to say I was very pleasantly surprised at using this software. This is the second year I have used it and will probably use it again next year.
customer_reviews.author: S. Grace

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.. walks you through the process
customer_reviews.text: I have used TurboTax for several years and have continued to be hapy with the product. It is easy to use and walks you through each step. It is nice that is pulls data in from previous year, if you used TurboTax, into the current return.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: product was offered at a great price. excellent communication between seller and buyer. great service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Parket

customer_reviews.title: How much to efile
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would tell you upfront how much they will charge you to efile! Does anyone know how much they charge you to efile using this download?
customer_reviews.author: G. Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Great product...
customer_reviews.text: I've used TurboTax for like the past 10 years and have never had an issue. I enjoy the product and look forward to the improvements they make every year to make the annual painful experience a tad more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Craig D. Prosser

customer_reviews.title: TurboTax Premier
customer_reviews.text: I found this 2007 TurboTax Premier software to be just as shown. It arrived free of shipping costs in about 7 days. When you begin your taxes, it connects to the Intuit site and downloads any updates. The price was lower than found locally, too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: TurboTax Premier Federal + State 2007
customer_reviews.text: SO FAR THE PROGRAM IS WORKING OUT FINE AS IT HAS IN THE PAST. WILL CONTNUE TO USE TURBOTAX IN THE FUTURE.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Klein

customer_reviews.title: useful and economical
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I needed but was unable to order directly from TurboTax because they are incapable of taking orders from outside the US.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory K. Wurzburg

customer_reviews.title: Turbo tax review
customer_reviews.text: Good product but I find information entries to form 1099-misc. for oil and gas royalty properties a bit difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Woodlan Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Way happy!
customer_reviews.text: Top-notch service. Received much sooner than stated! Could not beat the price either. Highly recommen!d
customer_reviews.author: Riley's Nana

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied with turbotax
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with Turbo Tax 2007. Taxes were successfully done & filed on time.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. White

customer_reviews.title: Albert
customer_reviews.text: I used this product in the past few years it was the same product but with Amazon it was chipper in price
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Alba Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Hassel to download
customer_reviews.text: I wish that companies can test several scenarios before they put their software out for the consumer. In order to download this software, I needed to shut off my firewall, then load Firefox. This download didn't work with IE. The software from INTUIT is great, but the download process can be time consuming. Silly me, I expected to click on the DOWNLOAD BUTTON and I expected it to download....
customer_reviews.author: D. ROBERTSON

product_meta.title: TurboTax Premier Federal + State 2007 [OLD VERSION]
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC Disc| Format:BoxAMAZON.COM
TurboTax Premier Federal + State 2007 guides you through your tax return, with simple-to-understand questions to help you finish and file your taxes. Find over 350 deductions, accurately value your investments, and account for life changes like retirement in order to get the largest tax refunds possible, guaranteed. If you need help, you can get advice from the Live Community with millions of taxpayers and experts ready to answer your questions. 

 Get More Out of Your Investments
Whether you own stocks, bonds, mutual funds, rental property, or all of the above, TurboTax Premier helps you get your maximum refund – guaranteed. 

 Explore More Than 350 Deductions 
Kick back and watch as we search your return for over 350 deductions, including mortgage interest, donations, and education. 


When you sell investments, TurboTax Premier helps you accurately report your profit. We find your purchase price in just 3 easy steps. 

 Discover Your Most Profitable Depreciation Method 
TurboTax Premier walks you through reporting depreciation of rental properties. We even show which depreciation method will get you the biggest deduction. 

 Find Over 20 Deductions for Landlords 
From travel to advertising to insurance, TurboTax Premier uncovers every deduction for your rental property. Take a break while we do the handy work. 

 Increase Your 401(k) Savings 
Boost your 401(k) contribution without hurting your paycheck. Choose to put your refund into your 401(k) plan and watch your interest grow. 

 Choose Easy


 NEW. Reduce Your Risk of an Audit
Take comfort. TurboTax Premier shows you how unlikely your return is to catch the IRS’ attention. We arm you with proof for your claims and help protect you from any IRS penalties. 

 Import Your Investment Information 
You don’t have to find your statements (or understand them. Import your investment info from thousands of financial institutions, including Merrill Lynch and Ameristar. 

 Easily Determine Capital Gains and Losses 
It’s simple. TurboTax Premier finds your capital gains and losses automatically. It keeps track of those that carryover to future tax returns – year after year. 

 NEW. Learn from the Live Community 
No research necessary. Just ask the Live Community questions and get answers for your situation. View advice from millions of taxpayers and experts right on your screen. 

 INCLUDED. Prepare Your State Return 
Watch your federal info instantly transfer into TurboTax State. You’ll be half finished before you even start your state return. 

 Includes Everything in TurboTax Deluxe 

 Explore Over 100 Deductions for Life Changes


 If you had an eventful year, congratulations. We’ll handle your new situation upfront so you can finish your return with confidence. Here’s how TurboTax Premier manages some of the possibilities: 

 Sold Investments 
TurboTax Premier finds the original purchase price of investments you sold. We automatically factor in dividends and stock splits – along with mergers and acquisitions – to keep your taxable gains low. 

 Retired 
It’s simple. We determine how the IRS will tax your investment distributions – as regular income or at the lower capital gains rate. Plus, we tell you if paying estimated taxes will keep more money in your pockets. 

 Rented Out Your Home 
It pays to be a landlord. TurboTax Premier shows you how to claim your second home as rental property. Then we reveal 20 deductions for it, including travel, repairs, and insurance. 

 Benefited from an Estate or Trust 
If a K-1 (1040) form landed in your mailbox, relax. It’s not as complicated as it looks. TurboTax Premier automatically calculates your taxes owed. Plus, we help you qualify for deductions, such as those for attorney fees and interest expenses. 

 TurboTax Premier also handles buying a home, selling your home, getting married, and having a baby. 

 Join the Millions Who Trust TurboTax


 Relax. TurboTax is dedicated to protecting your personal and financial information. From the most advanced technology to our relentless Privacy Team, we have you covered. 

 Your Information Travels Safely 
We protect your info like the Department of Defense protects theirs. Before you eFile, TurboTax encodes your information with the most advanced encryption technology. Only our computers can decode it, so you don’t have to worry about unapproved viewers. 

 Your Computer Stores Your Information
After you eFile, rest assured only you can access your return. TurboTax CD and Download products store your information right on your computer. You control it. 

 Our Commitment to You 
Our Privacy Team’s only job is to guard you and your information. 

 Tax Forms
It’s not as bad as it looks. Here are just some of the forms that TurboTax Premier Federal + State fills out for you: 

 *  Form 1040 Individual Income Tax Return Form 1040A Individual Income Short Form Form 1040EZ Individual Income Tax Return EZ Form 1040-V Payment Vouchers Form 1040X Amended Individual Tax Return Form 1099-DIV Dividend Income Worksheet Form 1099-G Certain Government Payments Form 1099-INT Interest Income Worksheet Form 1099-MISC Miscellaneous Income Worksheet Form 1099-MSA Medical Savings Account Distribution Form 1099-OID Original Issue Discount Form 1099-Q Qualified Education Program Payments Form 1099-R Distributions from Retirement Plans Worksheet Form 1116 Foreign Tax Credit Form 1310 Stmt of Person Claiming Refund Form 2106 Employee Business Expenses Form 2120 Multiple Support Declaration Form 2210 Underpayment of Estimated Tax Form 2210AI Annualized Income Form 2441 Child and Dependent Care Expenses 

Plus tons more to get all of your taxes taken care of.
feature_bullets: Guides you step-by-step through investments and rental property income
Assists with stocks, bonds, mutual funds and employee stock plans
Gives you tax-saving advice for 401Ks and IRAs
Provides extra guidance for rental property income, expenses and refinancing
Includes a download of one TurboTax State product - a $34.95 value
